author: jlmonteiro
msg: It seems Surefire is unhappy when in the same project, we try to execute both JUnit and TestNG tests. So, let's try a work around (See SUREFIRE-377).

author: nick
msg: Apply Staffan Olsson's patch from TIKA-482 (with a few tweaks), which improves how EXIF metadata is processed from TIFF and JPEG files, and moves more of the Date properties to be real ISO8601 dates internally.

author: jbellis
msg: use correct default name when converting to yaml.  patch by jbellis; reviewed by Jon Hermes for CASSANDRA-1419

author: noelgrandin
msg: PIVOT-625 Enable item deselection in list based controls (ListView, TableView, TreeView)
